title: Playing on ALT Account ( Gold 5 ) looking for Silver - Gold duo buddies
body:
**LOOKING TO PLAY WITH PEOPLE ON MY ALTERNATIVE ACCOUNT THAT IS GOLD 5**

I play AD / Top
But can perform in all other roles at a Plat 2 level.

Currently Diamond 5 61% winrate on main. 
It's turning into a clown fiesta in my elo, so I'm looking to take it easy on my other account when I need a break.

**Silver 5 - Gold 3, all are welcome.**

Please fill out form below, or just add me l o l

Rank:
Role:
Best champs in role:
Are you able to follow shot calling?:
Would you like to use voice comms?:

k ty

replies.body:
Rank: Silver V
Role: Support
Best champs in role: Soraka, Janna, Nami ... also play Braum, Lulu, Sona as needed
Are you able to follow shot calling?: I like to think so
Would you like to use voice comms?: it's really the only option for cohesive play

Silver 3 atm and sitting through an afk penalty thanks to my internet going down during a game, hence I'm wasting time on the boards. I'm a Teemo main and can play him all 5 slots (sup depends on the opposite sup, naut and others are murder). I also main Lux, Vi, Cait, Jinx, and Morg and have a knack for custom, off meta builds.
Voice comms: no
Shot calling: yes please, tired of mindless piling into mid lane.
Don't you love mindless mid pushing and still not ending before 40 minutes : ^) I know {{champion:75}} and {{champion:45}} do

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowOtaku618,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=ngN8G15N,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-10-04T21:35:47.507+0000)
>
> Don't you love mindless mid pushing and still not ending before 40 minutes : ^) I know {{champion:75}} and {{champion:45}} do

You just have to come to accept that everyone else is a monkey and as for yourself.. that's up to you to determine.
Alright cool, I'll add everyone after I'm finished patching.

Rank: Gold 4
Role: Top
Best champs in role: gangplank, rumble, gnar, kennen, shen, yasuo, riven
Are you able to follow shot calling?: definitely
Would you like to use voice comms?: definitely

Silver/Gold is a bit of a clown fiesta, as you call it, as well, but i would not mind tagging along. I am reliably mature and able to avoid drivethrough feeding.

I prefer midlane/support control/roaming mages but can play anything except jungle decently, i can use voice. currently S3 after giving up on ranked for the season, previously between S4/S1 over the last couple years.
your title is misleading. I thought you were gold 5

> [{quoted}](name=SKT 1 Voyboi,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=ngN8G15N,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-04T21:16:05.013+0000)
>
> your title is misleading. I thought you were gold 5

I am gold 5. Look at what it says, I'm looking for people to play on my alternative account.

here I updated the post for people who didn't read it carefully and misunderstood :/

> [{quoted}](name=463,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=ngN8G15N,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-04T21:18:41.662+0000)
>
> I am gold 5. Look at what it says, I'm looking for people to play on my alternative account.

yeah but i though your main is gold 5 and your silver. When i read that title

> [{quoted}](name=SKT 1 Voyboi,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=ngN8G15N,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-04T21:19:28.560+0000)
>
> yeah but i though your main is gold 5 and your silver. When i read that title

That sounds like a personal issue. I don't see how you could've extracted that information from my title.

It literally says playing on Alt Account ( Alternative Account ) Alternative as in other account.

Anyways.. I'm playing on a Gold 5 Smurf, my main isn't Gold or Silver, that should clarify everything for anyone reading.

**_Rank:_** Silver 4
**_Role:_ **Top and Mid | Jungle and Support (Right side is main left side is competent roles)
**_Best champs in role:_** Aatrox, Veigar, Sion, Yasuo, Fiora, Twitch, and a few other (In order of mains/comfort levels [ Aatrox is played rarely even though he is my main ])
**_Are you able to follow shot calling?:_** Yes
**_Would you like to use voice comms?:_** Yes makes communication easier. Pings aren't as effective sometimes.
